history.proof: intros H x y Hx Hy. unfold is_ring, intern, associativity, distributivity in H. shelve.

exceptions.tactic: intros S A Mult Add I O Opp v H x y Hx Hy.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
S: Set
A: S -> Prop
Mult: S -> S -> S
Add: S -> S -> S
I: S
O: S
Opp: S -> S
v: S -> nat

Goal:
is_ring -> forall x y : S, A x -> A y -> Mult x (Opp y) = Opp (Mult x y)

Premises:
is_ring = commutativity S Add /\ is_group S A Add O Opp /\ intern S A Mult /\ associativity S Mult /\ distributivity S Add Mult : Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments Datatypes.S _%nat_scope
regular_l : forall (S : Set) (G : S -> Prop) (Add : S -> S -> S) (O : S) (Opp : S -> S), is_group S G Add O Opp -> forall y z : S, G y -> G z -> forall x : S, G x -> Add x y = Add x z -> y = z
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : Fin.t ?n, Fin.FS x = Fin.FS y -> x = y where ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : Fin.t ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
mult_O : is_ring -> forall x : S, A x -> Mult x O = O /\ Mult O x = O
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat] ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
VectorDef.nth_order : VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v0 : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (vw : VectorDef.t ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v0, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v0 w where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat] ?m : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v0 : VectorDef.t ?A (Datatypes.S ?n), v0 = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v0) ?n (VectorDef.tl v0) where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_comm_cons : forall (v0 : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (a : ?A), VectorDef.cons ?A a (?n + ?m) (VectorDef.append v0 w) = VectorDef.append (VectorDef.cons ?A a ?n v0) w where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat] ?m : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p : Fin.t ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p)) = p where ?m : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
VectorDef.splitat : forall l r : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (l + r) -> VectorDef.t ?A l * VectorDef.t ?A r where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type]
VectorEq.eq_dec : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), {v1 = v2} + {v1 <> v2}
PeanoNat.Nat.eq_stepl : forall x y z : nat, x = y -> x = z -> z = y
VectorEq.eqb_eq : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), VectorEq.eqb A A_beq v1 v2 = true < -> v1 = v2
VectorDef.rectS : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (Datatypes.S n) -> Type, (forall a : ?A, P 0 (VectorDef.cons ?A a 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A))) -> (forall (a : ?A) (n : nat) (v0 : VectorDef.t ?A (Datatypes.S n)), P n v0 -> P (Datatypes.S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a (Datatypes.S n) v0)) -> forall (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (Datatypes.S n)), P n v where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type]
neutral : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> S -> Prop
distributivity : forall S : Set, (S -> S -> S) -> (S -> S -> S) -> Prop
is_group : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> S -> (S -> S) -> Prop
opposite : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> S -> (S -> S) -> Prop
PeanoNat.Nat.min_max_antimono : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le (Basics.flip le)) f -> forall x y : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.min (f x) (f y) = f (PeanoNat.Nat.max x y)
commutativity : forall S : Set, (S -> S -> S) -> Prop
associativity : forall S : Set, (S -> S -> S) -> Prop
intern : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> Prop
BinInt.Z.le = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y <> Gt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.divide = fun x y : nat => exists z : nat, y = z * x : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments PeanoNat.Nat.divide (_ _)%nat_scope
BinPosDef.Pos.to_nat = fun x : BinNums.positive => BinPosDef.Pos.iter_op Nat.add x 1 : BinNums.positive -> nat Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.to_nat _%positive_scope : simpl never
PeanoNat.Nat.gcd_wd = fun (x x' : nat) (Hx : x = x') (y y' : nat) (Hy : y = y') => PeanoNat.Nat.gcd_unique x y (PeanoNat.Nat.gcd x' y') (PeanoNat.Nat.gcd_nonneg x' y') ((fun lemma : x = x' => Morphisms.Reflexive_partial_app_morphism (Morphisms.subrelation_proper PeanoNat.Nat.divide_wd tt (Morphisms.subrelation_respectful (Morphisms.subrelation_refl eq) (Morphisms.subrelation_respectful (Morphisms.subrelation_refl eq) Morphisms.iff_flip_impl_subrelation))) (Morphisms.reflexive_proper_proxy RelationClasses.Equivalence_Reflexive (PeanoNat.Nat.gcd x' y')) x x' lemma) Hx (PeanoNat.Nat.gcd_divide_l x' y')) ((fun lemma : y = y' => Morphisms.Reflexive_partial_app_morphism (Morphisms.subrelation_proper PeanoNat.N...
VectorEq.eqb : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> bool) -> forall m n : nat, VectorDef.t A m -> VectorDef.t A n -> bool
List.nth : forall A : Type, nat -> list A -> A -> A
PeanoNat.Nat.induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A n -> A (Datatypes.S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
List.existsb : forall A : Type, (A -> bool) -> list A -> bool
PeanoNat.Nat.case_analysis : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A (Datatypes.S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
PeanoNat.Nat.bi_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A n <-> A (Datatypes.S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
List.map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
Relation_Definitions.relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Relation_Definitions.relation _%type_scope
List.firstn : forall A : Type, nat -> list A -> list A
PeanoNat.Nat.mod_wd_obligation_1 = fun (x y : nat) (H : x = y) (x0 y0 : nat) (H0 : x0 = y0) => eq_ind_r (fun x1 : nat => PeanoNat.Nat.modulo x x1 = PeanoNat.Nat.modulo y y0) (eq_ind_r (fun x1 : nat => PeanoNat.Nat.modulo x1 y0 = PeanoNat.Nat.modulo y y0) eq_refl H) H0 : Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) PeanoNat.Nat.modulo PeanoNat.Nat.modulo
VectorDef.cons : forall A : Type, A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (Datatypes.S n)
PeanoNat.Nat.lt_irrefl : forall x : nat, ~ x < x

``` 
intros S A Mult Add I O Opp v H x y Hx Hy.
unfold is_ring, intern, associativity, distributivity in H.
destruct H as [H_comm [H_group [H_intern [H_assoc H_dist]]].
rewrite H_intern, H_dist.
apply H_comm.
Qed. 
```

original: intros S A Mult Add I O Opp v H x y Hx Hy. unfold is_ring, intern, associativity, distributivity in H.
